Model.Position
Interface Position

All Known Implementing Classes:
Buyer, Deal_Position, Family_Casino_Night, Lottery, Mail_Position_1, Mail_Position_2, PAY_DAY, Radio_Contest, Sweepstakes, Yard_Sale
public interface Position

This is the interface of a Position that contains the methods signatures for every Position

Author:
Andreas Pattakos

Perform_Action

void Perform_Action(Player P1,
                    Player P2)
Observer: Does what the position says. (the contents of this method change from the position that implements it)
post-condition: Does what the Position says.

Parameters:
P1 - for the Player who is in that Position
P2 - for the other Player
